imdb_user_reviews.contents: When the world needed a hero, they called a villain.
Fantastic family fun, on par with the original
Riotously hilarious, sugary sweet, absolutely adorable and most of all marvelously miniontastic!
it's OK...  funny but a bit boring
Every You Would Want In A Family Film,
Meh, about what you get with sequel
40% more Minions a must go see!
If you liked the first, you'll like this one!
Do not believe these ratings - part 1 was a good movie, part 2 is definitely not.
One of the funniest movies I've ever seen
One of the worst sequels of all time.
How to Ruin a Great Idea
definitely worth seeing - as good as the first one
A hard step down from it's predecessor
A Sequel That's Just As Fun As The First
A fine sequel but not as charming as the predecessor.
Quite possibly one of the funniest movies of all time
The Despicable Me franchise lands its second outing on both light-weight feet.
Despicable 2 , not as good as first part but definitely worth watching.
A fun ride_ not great but entertaining
A Despicable sequel... In the best way!!
It was good in what it did.
You can't explain exactly why, but the minions make you laugh a lot!
The major flaw with this movie was for me the complete unawareness of gender issues.
If you liked the first one, you'll like this one. If you didn't like the first one, you'll still like this one!
Could they step it up above the first? Yes, yes they could. And they did.
The minions still make you laugh, nothing new to offer.
A 3D Experience That You Will Never Forget
Gru and his minions are back.
This movie was way to hyped up
Best jokes are in the trailer..
An excuse to make a lucrative sequel, basically backed by the Minions.
Comparison of Despicable me and Despicable me 2
Not perfect, but still funny and entertaining
'Despicable Me 2′ is quite enjoyable, despite lacking the emotional pull the first film had. It's packed with laughs, terrific visuals and great voice work.
Good watch, but inferior to the first
Not as funny as the other two movies in the franchise, but alright.
Good sequel which develops Gru as a character a bit more thoroughly
Despicable, With a Dose of Delightful
Occasionally funny, but hyper and unnecessary
A wonderful and just as entertaining sequel to a delightful film
A subpar sequel to the successful Despicable Me
First Film Was Just A Little Better.....
A perfect example of what not to do with a sequel, but still half enjoyable.
When a Sequel Is Done Right
This sequel reveals more antics of their characters and minion mischief. Most of all, there are also plenty of moments that made me go aww!
Besides a string of jokes, both adult and juvenile, the best moments in Despicable me 2 are when we get to see minions indulge in screwball mischief.
MY REVIEW: A Despicable Experience for DM1 Lovers!!
As enjoyable as the first but with more laughs and a superb soundtrack
Not as good as the first film due to little in the way of plot, it's still worth seeing just to watch the minions.
a simple family comedy with morals... but nothing more
Some weird moments, but still very entertaining
Good film, but inferior to the previous installment
One of the best animation movies of the year!
A hilarious and happy story of love in all its forms, simply the "Wrath of Khan" of its own franchise.(10/10) SPOILERS.
Just as entertaining as the first
Entertaining, funny movie that falls right into the middle ground
Absolute Minion fun the second time around.
Simple and good but expected a little more
very funny film great family entertainment
Not as bad as some cartoon sequels . . .
Hilarious... But no direction and magnitude
Feels Exactly Like the First One ... In a Good Way
Nothing beats the first, but at least it didn't disappoint
Fun, but less so than the original
Flows well but the ending is a bit of a disappointment
The Minions Are Back - Ever So Moreso
Set A Villain To Catch A Villain
EXCELLENT movie..... BUT something was very concerning
Love is a dangerous mission ...even for a villain
It's despicable if you haven't saw Despicable Me 2 yet. It's awesome fun!
Gru aka The Penguin is back
Sitcom-y but endearing in the best of ways
Shortly Saying: GO WATCH THE MOVIE PEOPLE!!
Not better than the first one, but very funny and enjoyable!
Animated Comedy Kids Movie, lacking in imagination
Move aside, Pixar. We've got our animated film of the summer.
Gru as a good guy and nasty  purple Minions!
Genuinely lovable; a worthy sequel, consistent jokes and that same sense of humor from the first movie
This movie tried too hard to play it safe.
The Minions save a weak sequel
Despicable Me 2 is the funniest movie I seen in a while.
I really liked it, very funny and great fun. Not as good as the first one.
Despicable Me 2 has tonnes of cuteness, but little else...
Just as Lovable and Funny as Before, But ...
Although Despicable Me 2 lacks some of the charm of the original, it is still well acted, well animated, and funny for all ages.
Less focused then the original, but still a good time
The Minions are probably one of the funniest characters ever created.
A funny, cute and adorable sequel that is really worth to watch.
A satisfying sequel to a growing franchise
The Best Sequel Of The Year So Far.
As lively, amusing and wacky as the original, but Gru's falling in love is pure slapstick that lacks the poignancy of his turn as an accidental father the last time round
don't waste your time even if anyone offers you to watch it for free
More Minions only helps this wonderful sequel.
Despicable Me 2 was an okay sequel to its previously okay predecessor
Best Film I've seen in a long time
Went to see this in the cinemas yesterday 5/7/13 very good follow up
A fun sequel for the whole family!
Just as fresh as the original one! cant recommend enough
You have to watch it if you love minions!
LIGHTBULB! Not so bright. REVIEW with SPOILERS!
I'd rate this film on about the same level as the first.
Just as fun as the first one!
What would Gru be without his Mignons...Mignons FTW!!
Whole is less than sum of the parts . . .
A Good Story And It Left Me With Tears In My Eyes From Laughing
Lacks it's originality, but undeniably cute
The same as the first one
Weak rehash of ideas from the first one
e. There's little substance underneath the generic plot and minion skits, but that doesn't keep it from being a fun and enjoyable family outing to the movies
A lot of fun, but Despicable Me 2 is no where near as good as the original
Warnings to parents.  Cute movie but scary to my youngest
Likable but not as good as first. A little small minded
The formula didn't really work this time!
Buy a DVD at the earliest (No piracy please. Encourage such movies)
